name: Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam
address: Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam, 1950 Oxford Connector, Port Coquitlam, BC V3B 4H3

featured_reviews.review_id: The gym is way too crowded, people there are not respectful. The membership took 10 minutes to signup. However, the cancellation took over a month and still hasn't been processed yet. They will promise you no questions asked policy if you need to cancel in the first 10 days, but a guy in the management was very rude and he interrogated me like a cop and treated very poorly questioning my affordability and saying "of course you are going to club 16" - why is that any of your concern where I go next? I had to talk to 2 different people just to know that I can simply send an email to cancel.
featured_reviews.review_text: The gym is way too crowded, people there are not respectful. The membership took 10 minutes to signup. I had to talk to 2 different people just to know that I can simply send an email to cancel.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: We appreciate your feedback, Paras. If you would be open to discussing your experience further, please reach out to us at (778) 285-4653. We would love the opportunity to resolve any issues. Thank you, Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: Golds Gym PoCo is a great gym, I love the layout and the fact that there's a women's only space. Simon was my personal trainer for 3 months and he was the absolute best (I would recommend him a 1000 times. Very professional, funny, very knowledgeable, gets the job done with minimal injury. I experienced amazing increase in strength and fitness within the 3-month period. Everyone is nice and helpful. Loving it!
featured_reviews.review_text: Golds Gym PoCo is a great gym, I love the layout and the fact that there's a women's only space. Simon was my personal trainer for 3 months and he was the absolute best (I would recommend him a 1000 times. Very professional, funny, very knowledgeable, gets the job done with minimal injury. I experienced amazing increase in strength and fitness within the 3-month period. Everyone is nice and helpful. Loving it!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Moji. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! So glad you're crushing your fitness goals and feeling stronger due to your sessions with Simon! Excited to see what you can accomplish next with him!  - Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: I was blown away by the customer service I received when I first came in with my sister as a guest. Cole showed us around the entire gym letting us know what Golds gym had to offer in PoCo. From the welcoming community to the outstanding customer service, the gym had everything I needed to do my full week workout rotation. Something not many gyms I've been to have. 5/5 would recommend asking for Cole for the tour!
featured_reviews.review_text: I was blown away by the customer service I received when I first came in with my sister as a guest. featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Winston. Thank you for taking the time to post a review! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your experience at Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam. Our goal is always to exceed your expectations! If there's anything we can help you with, please don't hesitate to let us know. We hope to see you again soon, Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: Gold's is always good, but the staff here are great. Always good vibes. Paolo gave me so much helpful information to help me with my fitness goals. Highly recommend.
featured_reviews.review_text: Gold's is always good, but the staff here are great. Always good vibes. Paolo gave me so much helpful information to help me with my fitness goals. Highly recommend.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Feria. Thanks for taking the time to share your positive experience. We truly appreciate it! - Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: For me to take time out of work and write a review is a lot, nor do I like to cause trouble. I just want to share my experience that can save others a hassle and potential harassment. Being a nurse and also a business owner, I didn't think I would go through a major downfall. Life happened where I lost my house and had to move in with relatives while I went through counselling and getting back on my feet now 2.5years later. These guys sent me to collections for over $600.00 not because of gym time I used but because OF A CONTRACT. Even knowing the circumstance I was in. With that being said, started then harassment phone calls, once again because of a CONTRACT. We are in an era where please try to refrain from any signage of contracts as possible. Then this year they sent another total to collections for an account that did not exist trying to collect extra money. Thank God I still kept the email of confirmation from 2.5 years ago. When I called, I knew I also needed email proof so they don't lie. Instead of an apology of trying to extort more money and sending it to collections, the women recanted and said she didn't have proof in writing but I sent the previous email for account closure and final receipt from the years prior. These idiots have caused so much time wastage and stress. To make time to even do this review, I'm at work on my break.  I could of course not afford a lawyer than whereas I can now and would of fought this just for the purpose of humanity. I have a membership with Club 16/She's Fit, Club Pilates and a personal trainer now. They are not like this. Transparency is key and this company really will Destry you when there is a bigger picture in life. DO NOT SIGN UP WITH THEM. THEY HAVE NOT CHANGED ANYTHING. Anyhow if you go through something in life, the customer service you will received from this company is beyond disgusting. There are many companies with policies in place like ones I work for and I own where we consider cancellation of services and deposit based on individual need. I will be posting more on my blogs in the upcoming months in regards to contracts. Also when approaching them, assure you have it in email - which is what I did to assure they didn't falsely take more money.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I'm going to Gold's gym for a long time like four years. There's a lot of useful equipment you may use   The crews are very nice and the equipments are well maintained.
If you don't know how to use them you may ask the trainers.
I recommend this gym to anyone who cares about health and wellness.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi, Behzad. Thanks for the review! We appreciate the kind words and are glad we could provide you with a positive fitness experience at Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam. Kindly, Gold's Gym Port Coquitlam Team.

featured_reviews.review_id: I've been coming here for personal training with Kiefer for about a few weeks now and I've been very happy with his work. He knows what to work on with me and provides me with tips and feedback so overall I'm really happy with this gym.
featured_reviews.review_text: I've been coming here for personal training with Kiefer for about a few weeks now and I've been very happy with his work. He knows what to work on with me and provides me with tips and feedback so overall I'm really happy with this gym.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I had an incredibly disappointing experience at Gold's Gym in Port Coquitlam that has left me feeling both frustrated and disheartened. The management team there has consistently displayed a lack of customer service skills, bordering on rudeness. During all my workouts, I was abruptly told not to drop the weights, a message that could have been conveyed in a much more polite and professional manner.

But what truly pushed me over the edge was the handling of my membership cancellation. Amidst the COVID-19 pandemic, I called to cancel my membership and was under the impression that it had been taken care of. Imagine my surprise when I just recently found out my membership was still active, and I had been billed all this time. When I called to rectify the situation, I was met with vague responses and no straightforward answers.

I've since signed up with West Coast Iron, a nearby gym, and the difference in customer service and gym quality is night and day. Gold's Gym in Port Coquitlam has been by far the worst gym experience I've ever had, and I strongly urge anyone considering a membership to think twice.
